Title: Scooby-Doo! Abracadabra-Doo
Writer: Alan Burnett (story), Alan Burnett (teleplay), Paul Dini (teleplay), Misty Lee (teleplay)
Actors: Frank Welker, Matthew Lillard, Grey Griffin, Mindy Cohn
Plot: The gang goes on a trip to check on Velma's younger sister, Madelyn. She's been studying stage magic at the Whirlen Merlin Magic Academy, where apparently there have been sightings of a giant griffin. The gang decides to investigate.
